chunks.original_text: 五部大夫君吏七部天官将一合来下，主为回化官事，若有逆吏梦人县官口舌，所见增疾者，启所在监察考召三师二十四君将吏，某奉道行身，修真种德，而为恶人甲遂吏某等所见增疾，某受道宣化，得当助国治民，佐天行化，扶命养善伐恶等，长短欲见伤善，愿请东方大领神父、西方大领神母、南方大领神父、北方大领神母、中央大领神君、主领恶人逆使某口舌不语，从此绝若某欲见口说者，又请太阴君吏十二人，为某收捕魂、令文墨不举，口舌不起、四方县官众祟伏恩主治。 保六畜 凡畜养牛马驴骡等列毛色头数，启百虫畜收王相君将吏一合来下主者。
chunks.translated_text:
The Five Divisions’ Grand Master Lords and officers, together with the Seven Divisions’ Heavenly Official Generals, descend in assembly to preside over the affairs of the Transformative Retribution Bureau. Should there be rebellious officers who, in dreams, cause men to encounter disputes with county officials or suffer from aggravated illness, petition the local Censors to summon the Three Masters and the Twenty-Four Lords, Generals, and officers. [State:] “I, so-and-so, uphold the Dao and cultivate the body, nurturing truth and sowing virtue, yet am afflicted by the malevolent agents of such-and-such a person—officers so-and-so—who have exacerbated my illness. I have received the Dao’s mandate to propagate transformation, to assist in governing the state and ordering the people, to aid Heaven’s transformative work, to sustain life, nourish goodness, and punish evil. Yet these beings, whether long or short in form, seek to harm the good. I humbly invoke the Eastern Great Divine Father, the Western Great Divine Mother, the Southern Great Divine Father, the Northern Great Divine Mother, and the Central Great Divine Lord, to take command of these malevolent rebels and their agents, silencing their slanderous speech. Henceforth, may their words be cut off. Should any still seek to speak maliciously, I further invoke the Twelve Officers of the Grand Yin Lord to seize and capture their souls, rendering their documents and writings ineffectual, their slanderous speech inert, and subduing all malevolent spirits and county officials in the four directions under the sovereign’s governance.

To protect the six livestock: For all domesticated cattle, horses, donkeys, mules, and the like, specify their fur color and headcount, and petition the Lords and Generals of the Hundred Worms and Livestock Assembly—Wang and Xiang—to descend and take charge.”

chunks.original_text: 养畜七六营，肥健蕃息，无有折伤，天仪君官将一百二十人，治休官，主为民某养六畜，息无死主之。 昊水期官将一百二十人，治赤云室主及天下六畜疾病之精祟，收之。 天阳君一人官将一百二十人，治夫君肉室，主万民宅中不利牛马保护之，令好盛不死。 逐盗贼 天位君五人官将一百二十人，治扶宗君，主人家宅不盗贼劫抄。 东西太白君官将一百二十人，治天乾室，主为天下郡乡亭里域万民劫抄盗贼，杀之者察之。 万姓君官将一百二十人，治和仙室，主万民心肠不正，盗贼掠取，劫抄主收之。 日男千二百人赤衣，主收天下盗贼怨仇主之。 月女千二百人白衣，主收天下女子为人盗贼劫收之。 贬君官将一百二十人，治百角室，主天下阴阳，十二种官将，行列返逆老之，承天大兵十万人，赤积丹衣，主及百姓更相劫掠，男女阴阳悖乱却臧之，上历逆清玄君百万人，收地上盗贼，逐捕逃亡，全不得脱，日月大兵十万人绛衣，主阴阳为汉国辟捕千贼万盗，主收之。 寿命度厄 南上君官将一百二十人，治仓果室，开天门益人寿命，病者得愈，殃祸者消灭之。 寿命君官将一百二十人，治安昌室，主为天下万民致寿命延此度厄不衰。 南昌君官将一百二十人，治列库室、历犯周旋八纪之中，脱下死籍，还着本命，消灭三虫，伏长生不老，八十岁更为十五童。 明堂绛室君官将一百二十人、治城宫室，主祭酒心伤万端，还寿延年，管度世神仙，逆人不行。 天公君一人卫即三万九千人刑生，可以此世过厄千岁。 解厄君官将一百二十人，主为解除年命之上刑厄咱星拓鬼，精鬼祟杀，害过度衰厄。 录魂长生 玉女素历千二百人，衣赤衣，主致长生承差，具录某身三魂七魄，不得远离某，主长生疾病，差除素女千二百人，主致长生延命疾病，具录魂魄，无令远人身精人安。 周玉君将一百二十人，治地理宫，主致一百二十生黑，神衣赤积，节禁人三魂七魄、不弃人身，保命延年，长八百岁。 玉女医疾 若命在水中，当各转出之。 若命在棺中，当为破出之。 若在狱中，当多掘出之。 若命在树，当为下之。 若命在狱中，当多开而出之。 若命在墓冢中，当为开而遣之。 若禄命尽者，当为增之。 若文书拘摄，当为央放之。 若事天官，时见省理之。 兆民有急，以时差愈。 大龙君一人官将一百二十人，治七星室，主罢天下卜问医药灸刺血，令无不行主之。 东明大夫君五人官将一百二十人、治天帝宫，主操持炼药治男女当使服之。 山周君一人官将一百二十人，治始生室、玉女素女五童，致仙药神方，为小儿黄衣，即命玉女月玄玉女千二百人，白衣持神方典治男女被病人差愈。 上清太仙明堂玉女千二百人，主致神药，一合下典治某身中所苦消灭，天医官医太医、五官治病医吏各十二人，一合下诣某处，入某身中五脏六腑十二宫室，布流一百二十关节、行神布黑，典治痛处，重劫某身治病功曹，为所请官将医吏，共案行某身、从头至足、治肺察熙，六脉浮沉，沉处为安，浮处为散，涤除五脏、安稳六腑、辟斥故黑，饮食鬼贼，精妖疾疫，使杀兵寒灾散，与人相远离，得蒙恩祈，苦除愈以为效信。 治风毒癞病 玉女君官将一百二十人，治长命室，主二十四黑，主典治某身癞病毒虫、浮风取苦、灾患除赤，丙子仁君官将一百二十人，治又伤室，主天下玉女布行丹田之熙，主治万虫癞病毒蛊消除之。
chunks.translated_text:
Here the Divine Host of Seven and Six Nourishments is invoked to ensure that livestock grow fat, strong, and multiply without loss or harm. The Celestial Pattern Lords and their one hundred twenty officers, who govern the Bureau of Blessings, are petitioned to oversee the people’s herds, ensuring their growth and shielding them from death.

The Azure Water Period Lords and their one hundred twenty officers, who govern the Crimson Cloud Chamber, are called upon to master and suppress the malevolent spirits that afflict the six livestock throughout the world. The Celestial Yang Lord and his one hundred twenty officers, who govern the Chamber of Flesh, are summoned to protect the homes of the myriad people, ensuring that their cattle and horses thrive and do not perish.

**Against Thieves and Bandits**
The Five Celestial Position Lords and their one hundred twenty officers, who govern the Bureau of Ancestral Protection, are invoked to guard the homes and dwellings of the people from theft, banditry, and plunder. The Eastern and Western Great White Lords and their one hundred twenty officers, who govern the Celestial Qian Chamber, are petitioned to oversee the domains, villages, and hamlets of the world, investigating and suppressing those who commit robbery, banditry, or murder. The Lords of the Myriad Clans and their one hundred twenty officers, who govern the Chamber of Harmonious Immortals, are called upon to rectify the hearts and minds of the people, seizing those who engage in theft, plunder, or banditry.

One thousand two hundred Red-Clad Solar Males are summoned to capture and subdue the bandits, thieves, and vengeful enemies of the world. One thousand two hundred White-Clad Lunar Females are invoked to seize and restrain women who engage in theft or banditry. The Demotion Lords and their one hundred twenty officers, who govern the Hundred-Horned Chamber, are petitioned to oversee the yin and yang of the world, dispatching their twelve ranks of officers to reverse the rebellious and the aged. They command the Celestial Great Army of one hundred thousand, clad in crimson and vermilion, to suppress those who plunder one another, rectifying the chaos of yin and yang among men and women. Ascending to the Pure Mystery Lords of the Upper Register, one million strong, they capture the bandits of the earth, pursuing and apprehending fugitives, ensuring none escape. The Solar and Lunar Great Armies of one hundred thousand, clad in deep red, are summoned to suppress and seize the bandits and thieves who disrupt the yin and yang of the Han realm.

**Prolonging Life and Overcoming Calamity**
The Southern Upper Lords and their one hundred twenty officers, who govern the Granary Chamber, are invoked to open the Celestial Gate, prolonging the lives of the people, healing the sick, and dissolving misfortunes and disasters. The Lords of Longevity and their one hundred twenty officers, who govern the Chamber of Peace and Prosperity, are petitioned to bestow long life upon the myriad people, guiding them through calamity without decline. The Southern Prosperity Lords and their one hundred twenty officers, who govern the Chamber of Sequential Storehouses, are called upon to navigate the cycles of the Eight Epochs, removing names from the registers of the dead and restoring them to their original destinies, eradicating the Three Worms, and ensuring eternal youth. At eighty, one may be restored to the vitality of a fifteen-year-old child.

The Crimson Chamber Lords of the Luminous Hall and their one hundred twenty officers, who govern the Palace Chambers, are invoked to heal the myriad afflictions of the heart caused by wine, restoring longevity and overseeing the divine immortals who transcend the world, preventing the rebellious from acting. The Celestial Duke and his thirty-nine thousand guardians of life and execution are summoned to extend this life beyond a thousand years of calamity. The Lords of Calamity Resolution and their one hundred twenty officers are petitioned to dissolve the celestial punishments, starry afflictions, and spectral curses that bring harm, guiding the people through decline and misfortune.

**Recording the Soul and Ensuring Longevity**
One thousand two hundred Jade Maidens in white garments, bearing red sashes, are invoked to bestow longevity, recording the three *hun* and seven *po* of the petitioner’s soul, ensuring they do not stray far, and healing all illnesses. One thousand two hundred Plain Maidens are summoned to extend life, cure diseases, and record the *hun* and *po*, preventing them from leaving the body and ensuring the vitality of the essence.

The Lords of the Jade Cycle and their one hundred twenty officers, who govern the Chamber of Earthly Principles, are called upon to bestow one hundred twenty black-clad spirits, their garments crimson and vermilion, to restrain the three *hun* and seven *po*, ensuring they do not abandon the body, preserving life and extending years to eight hundred.

**Jade Maidens Who Heal Illness**
If one’s fate lies in water, they shall be turned and drawn out. If one’s fate lies in a coffin, it shall be broken open to release them. If one’s fate lies in prison, it shall be dug open to free them. If one’s fate lies in a tree, they shall be brought down. If one’s fate lies in confinement, the bonds shall be loosened to release them. If one’s fate lies in a tomb, it shall be opened to send them forth. If one’s allotted lifespan is exhausted, it shall be extended. If one is bound by documents or summons, they shall be released. If one serves the celestial officials, their case shall be reviewed in due time. For the people in dire need, healing shall come swiftly.

The Great Dragon Lord and his one hundred twenty officers, who govern the Chamber of the Seven Stars, are invoked to abolish all divination, medicine, moxibustion, acupuncture, and bloodletting throughout the world, ensuring none are left unattended. The Five Eastern Brightness Grand Masters and their one hundred twenty officers, who govern the Celestial Emperor’s Palace, are summoned to prepare and refine elixirs for men and women to consume.

The Mountain Cycle Lord and his one hundred twenty officers, who govern the Chamber of Primordial Birth, along with the Jade Maidens, Plain Maidens, and Five Youths, are called upon to bestow divine elixirs and sacred formulas. For children afflicted with yellowing sickness, the one thousand two hundred Lunar Mystery Jade Maidens in white garments, bearing sacred formulas, are invoked to heal the sick and restore them to health.

The Upper Clarity Great Immortal Maidens of the Luminous Hall, one thousand two hundred strong, are summoned to bestow divine medicines, administering them to eradicate the petitioner’s suffering. The Celestial Physicians, the Grand Physicians, and the Five Officials, along with their twelve medical officers, are called upon to descend to the petitioner’s location, entering the five viscera, six bowels, and twelve chambers of the body. They shall traverse the one hundred twenty joints, circulating the divine *qi* and black essence, treating the afflicted areas. The Merit-Officers of Healing and the invoked officers and medical officials shall examine the petitioner’s body from head to toe, diagnosing the lungs and inspecting the *qi*. Where the pulse is deep, there is stability; where it is floating, there is dissipation. They shall purge the five viscera, stabilize the six bowels, expel old impurities, and banish the ghosts of food, thieves, and spectral plagues. They shall disperse the weapons of cold, disasters, and epidemics, driving them far from the petitioner, ensuring the grace of the invoked powers brings healing and relief as a sign of efficacy.

**Healing Wind Poison and Leprosy**
The Jade Maiden Lords and their one hundred twenty officers, who govern the Chamber of Longevity, are invoked to oversee the Twenty-Four Blacks, administering treatment for leprosy, poisonous worms, floating wind afflictions, and suffering, dissolving disasters and reddening the afflicted. The Renzi Benevolent Lords and their one hundred twenty officers, who govern the Chamber of Secondary Harm, are called upon to oversee the Jade Maidens who traverse the Cinnabar Field, eradicating the myriad worms, leprosy, poisons, and curses.

Yin Lord to seize and capture their souls, rendering their documents and writings ineffectual, their slanderous speech inert, and subduing all malevolent spirits and county officials in the four directions under the sovereign’s governance.

To protect the six livestock: For all domesticated cattle, horses, donkeys, mules, and the like, specify their fur color and headcount, and petition the Lords and Generals of the Hundred Worms and Livestock Assembly—Wang and Xiang—to descend and take charge.”

chunks.original_text: 收先祖病子孙 无上方苍君兵士十万人，主收却先祖五墓之鬼未病子孙者，分别生死之黑，断绝耗害主之，无上方官君兵士十万人，主收先祖病子孙，语者主收断之。 收死人耗害 都星君一人官将一百二十人、治青盖室，主解星死断绝复连制三，杀灾灭咎殃，不得复连生人，素车白马君兵士十万人，主收十二墓鬼，未病生人者断绝之。 无上天君兵士十万人，收某家中水火汤注乙石二十刑杀之鬼、却死未生复连殃注之黑消灭之。 都官君官将一百二十人，治太阴室，主收某家中星死血亲之鬼，耗乱人者断绝之。 天玄君官将一百二十人，治少肠室，主收却冢墓鬼祟病主人者。 石安君官将一百二十人，治始室，主收死人未为精祟者，断绝耗害之。 石仙君将一百二十人，治天下万民家中外亡强徉之鬼，厌绝注鬼为人精祟者，转相注易后生人疾病者，死主断绝之。 诛殃君官将一百二十人、治仓明堂，主为某收断死次还流，逆杀殃咎复连生人者，断绝之。 若故妇致来注病生人，请大皓大典者吏收摄故妇，致魂魄检押死人某，不得令还贼病生人，又请太白兵星荧惑吏一合下，收死时煞炁消减绝，复连葬死送收冢讼。 九地君官将一百二十人，治地理宫，为万民出丧葬埋，收正月至十二月建墓鬼，葬埋以续疾病呎讼鬼法所为主之乡，大神官将百二十人治其宫，主万民移徙，缮治作冢月食禁忌之鬼主之。 郡候君官将吏一百二十人，治泰玄室，生收丘墓之鬼绝墓神兵墓伯冢中。 二千石为民作精祟大言官君将一百二十人，治安渠室，主收天下万民葬埋之后，死人不安，疾病生人者，墓冢之鬼。 九玄察炁君一人，官将一百二十人，治四泽室，主自补葬埋土公之羔除减消散之。 九地君一人，官将一百二十人，治宫室，主万葬埋劫堤收万鬼解过，主葬埋之。 地申君一人，官将一百二十人，治遂宫，主天下万民开冢户，啼哭言窖，令厌有岁病。 录祭酒求录 三元节月九候龙使者，六甲父母官将各一百二十人，解夭千二百考吏等书自证者，形和气君官将一百二十人，治旦寄室，收诸祭酒谴考相及代者，正典直杀之。 天还室白衣兵十万，众生诸考吏察正之。 天西辰君一人，赤衣裳兵士十万人，主收考召正炁所主大宫时。 顿治功曹左右功曹五人，官将一百二十人，主治田宅吏解考主之。 察炁君治名山宫主，收考诸祭酒饮食肉淫佚者主祭杀之。 四明君五人，官将一百二十人，劫祭酒治舍炁不安稳，主禁不正炁解法考，分别清浊正炁。 国三考白兔君官将一百二十人，治骆城室，治中鬼乱考召师罪过下，此神为师马天下切，分别官吏兵解罪师过。 毕女君一人，官将一百二十人，治仙室，主解祭酒犯录上禁，忌饮酒食肉，行轻重於民间奸淫通之罪，皆使无它。 国三考白巽君一人，官将一百二十人，治骆城室，主治中恶犯考吏罪过，分别释玉解考君。 察奸君一人，官将一百二十人，治名山室，主祭酒犯录饮酒食肉，民子淫盗解之犯。 录可用移徙，吏主营护某家男女釜鳌，六畜移徙出宅，开通无它却十二辰禁忌。 护香滋好 恭食君官将一百二十人，治明系室，主万民养蚕卧起齐光泽滋，出以系如意。 供食君将一百二十人，治天禄宫，主为万民蚕健食解，好中神男神女，玉男玉女，素男素女，玄男玄女养蚕。
chunks.translated_text:
**Collecting Ancestral Ills Affecting Descendants**
The Supreme Azure Lords of the Utmost Realm, with one hundred thousand divine soldiers, are tasked with seizing the ghosts of the five ancestral tombs that afflict descendants yet unborn, distinguishing the black [qi] of life and death, and severing the depletion and harm they govern. The Supreme Realm’s Official Lords, with one hundred thousand divine soldiers, are charged with collecting ancestral ills passed to descendants, and those who speak of such matters shall be seized and severed.

**Collecting the Depletion of the Dead**
The Capital Star Lord, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Azure Canopy Chamber, resolving the deaths of stars, severing repeated connections, and eliminating the three [sources of harm], slaying disasters and eradicating misfortunes, ensuring they do not reconnect with the living. The Lord of the White Chariot and White Horses, with one hundred thousand divine soldiers, collects the ghosts of the twelve tombs that afflict the living yet unborn and severs them. The Supreme Heavenly Lords, with one hundred thousand divine soldiers, gather the ghosts within the petitioner’s household—those of water, fire, scalding, poison, and the twenty executioners—and expel the black [qi] of death that seeks to reconnect with the living, dissolving and annihilating them.

The Capital Official Lords, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Great Yin Chamber, collecting the star-dead ghosts of blood kin within the petitioner’s household who deplete and disrupt the living, severing them. The Heavenly Mysterious Lords, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Lesser Intestine Chamber, seizing the tomb ghosts that afflict the master of the house. The Stone Peace Lords, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Origin Chamber, collecting the dead who have not yet become spectral hauntings and severing their depletion and harm. The Stone Immortal Lords, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the households of the myriad people under heaven, expelling the strong and wayward ghosts of the dead, suppressing and severing the spectral hauntings that afflict people, and those who transmit illnesses to later generations, ensuring death severs their connections.

The Punishment Lords, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Granary Bright Hall, acting on behalf of the petitioner to sever the flowing back of death’s residual harm, reversing the killing misfortunes that reconnect with the living, and cutting them off. If a former wife has returned to afflict the living with illness, the Great Radiant and Great Canon Officials are invoked to seize the former wife, restrain her soul and spirit, and detain the dead, preventing her from returning to harm the living. Furthermore, the Tai Bai Star and Ying Huo Officials are summoned in unison to collect and dissolve the killing qi of the dead, severing its reconnection, and to gather the dead for burial and resolve tomb disputes.

The Nine Earth Lords, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Earthly Principles Palace, overseeing the burial of the dead among the myriad people, collecting the tomb ghosts from the first to the twelfth month, and severing the illnesses, curses, and disputes arising from improper burials. The Great Divine Official Lords, with one hundred twenty officers, govern this palace, presiding over the relocation of the myriad people, the repair of tombs, and the taboos of the months and eclipses.

The Commandery Sentinel Lords, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Supreme Mystery Chamber, seizing the ghosts of mounds and tombs, severing the divine soldiers and tomb lords within. The Two Thousand Stone Official Lords, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Peace Channel Chamber, collecting the tomb ghosts of the myriad people under heaven who, after burial, do not rest and afflict the living with illness. The Nine Mysterious Qi-Inspecting Lords, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Four Marshes Chamber, rectifying and supplementing burials, dissolving and dispersing the [harmful] qi of the earthly administrators.

The Nine Earth Lords, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Palace Chamber, overseeing all burials, gathering the myriad ghosts, resolving transgressions, and presiding over proper interment. The Earthly Petition Lords, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Following Palace, ensuring that when the myriad people under heaven open tombs, their wailing and lamentations do not invite years of illness.

**Recording and Examining Libationers**
During the Three Primordial Festivals, the Nine Seasonal Dragon Envoys, the Six Jia Parents, and their one hundred twenty officers each, resolve the one thousand two hundred deceased officials and scribes who bear self-incriminating records. The Harmonious Qi Lords, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Dawn Lodge Chamber, collecting all libationers who have been reprimanded or examined, and those who have taken their place, executing them according to the proper canon.

One hundred thousand White-Clad Soldiers of the Heavenly Return Chamber scrutinize and rectify the myriad deceased officials. The Heavenly Western Chen Lord, with one hundred thousand Red-Clad Soldiers, collects and rectifies the qi governed by the great palace of the hour. The Left and Right Merit Officers, five in total, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the resolution of household and estate officials under examination.

The Qi-Inspecting Lords govern the Palace of Famous Mountains, collecting and executing libationers who indulge in meat, wine, and debauchery. The Four Illuminating Lords, five in total, with one hundred twenty officers, suppress libationers who disrupt the qi of their dwellings, prohibiting improper qi and resolving the methods of examination, distinguishing the pure from the turbid and rectifying the qi.

The White Rabbit Lords of the Three Examinations, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Camel City Chamber, resolving the chaotic ghosts among the examined and the sins of the summoning masters, for these spirits are critical to the masters under heaven, distinguishing officials, soldiers, and the resolution of masters’ transgressions. The Jade Maiden Lords, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Immortal Chamber, resolving libationers who violate the prohibitions of the celestial records, indulge in wine and meat, and commit adultery among the people, ensuring no further harm.

The White Xun Lords of the Three Examinations, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Camel City Chamber, resolving the malevolent influences among the examined and the sins of the officials, distinguishing and releasing the Jade-Resolving Examination Lords. The Inspecting Deceit Lords, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Famous Mountain Chamber, collecting libationers who violate the records by consuming wine and meat, and those who commit adultery or theft among the people.

**Permissible Relocations**
Officials oversee the protection of the petitioner’s household—men, women, cauldrons, and tripods—and the relocation of livestock from the residence, opening the way and averting the taboos of the twelve branches.

**Nurturing Silkworms and Offering Food**
The Reverent Feeding Lords, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Bright Silken Chamber, ensuring the myriad people’s silkworms thrive in their resting and rising, their luster abundant, and their silk produced as desired. The Provisioning Lords, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Heavenly Emolument Palace, resolving the food of the myriad people’s silkworms, and the divine boys and girls—Jade Boys and Girls, White Boys and Girls, Mysterious Boys and Girls—who nurture the silkworms.

The Renzi Benevolent Lords and their one hundred twenty officers, who govern the Chamber of Secondary Harm, are called upon to oversee the Jade Maidens who traverse the Cinnabar Field, eradicating the myriad worms, leprosy, poisons, and curses.

chunks.original_text: 滋母温室新妇等各二十四人合下，址阁诣某蚕室中温暖之保护，令滋好同收丝万倍，无有伤之。 田作瓜瓠 田作种种，当启所部署宫，四野五野七野都平君城，山川祇稷社召楹亢。 白蚕君，主保五谷，苗茎滋好，结子成实，收入万倍。 九野君官将一百二十人，治地尽宫，主万民田作求利，虫儿不害，鹿走得百倍。 五谷君官将一百二十人，治大水宫，主万民五谷。 草易理，苗茎滋好，收深猜熊疾虫蝗，群精消之，收谷百倍。 天田君官将一百二十人，治地房宫，主万民种禾，令收大得之。 五田外田九野都平君自营，岁终田作五谷，今为俗有异诡，马谷一斛，以为劲信。 五千王君官将一百二十人，治九水室，主万民田作手法。 六畜君官将一百二十人，治明堂，主万民主瓜瓠，收子倍得，无有死伤。 远行万里 万里君官将一百二十人宣祖讳治炁室，主万民远行万里，道里四通，不逢祸殃。 北马君一人，官将一百二十人，治室房室，主将帅远行，不为恶吏所得，令轻身自行千里。 明堂玉女千二百人，衣白衣，主远民远行万里，不逢殃愈难主之。 万福君官将一百二十人，主保万民远行万里，道路滑利，却死来生，转祸为福，收除殃杀，往还无它，思所意所所从心。 市买欺诈 驿骆门监市君官将一百二十人，治天市室，主收天下害鬼，考治生殃屠沽酒，开店卖与百姓贫民，私行轻秤少升，诈诞欺人主之。 无上万福君吏二十八人，求五利金银布帛绵绢谷米钱物，所思者至，所索者皆得，主治招财求利。 北面昌盲君一人，官将一百二十人，治北水室，主水船人赋，买重量大蚪，卖利诈诞都市不中考之。 无上万福君官将一百二十人，主求五利金银布帛，所思者得，所愿者成。 天河君官将吏一百二十人，治九江室，主记录河伯劝水更生为休，莫加月三辅之张、三钩三荀卿得。 叛道求还 化炁君官将一百二十人，治赤兔赤，收叛民某从使还，得化属道，不得稽迟主之。 九会君官将一百二十人，治还宅主，从九天召吏下方民，令且化之属道主来之。 九会君官将一百二十人，治还宅主，从九天考召吏，收叛民户主来。 祭酒开心 夫子君官将一百二十人，治紫微盖室，主男女官祭酒心腹童蒙，令之化圣使都却鬼语。 玉仙君官将一百二十人，治太素主女官祭酒心腹童蒙，令之化圣，使知鬼女。 五经化炁君将一百二十人，治九奇室，主祭酒童蒙，令自受教使。 □ 口民若开心思明，众与有异，请五星二人官将一百二十人，下注某身。 请周天八极君，左右阴阳明次吏十二人下并某身，隐意定志。 入山不渴 盖天君官将一百二十人，治道门室，主请山神师入名山，道却神可在致山道玉女素女主之。 青城寿历十二人赤绮衣，主为师长生一百二十年，方入名山。 泰谓饱吏左右五人，官将一百二十人，主制三尸，令人不饥渴长生。 王域行厨君官将一百二十人、治王门室、主令师制炁不食不饥，可入名山，不用粮精广神也童子。 金仓君官将一百二十人，治神皇室，主致谷食炁，可入名山，不饥渴同炁至仙官。 制天君官将二十人，治丈人室，主祭天官，道鬼号不别，炁历师祭酒得道，下屯神分别主之。 天倚邦君五人，治五辰室，主师守中神，愿美色好老，更丁一日。
chunks.translated_text:
**Silkworm Nurturers and Crop Cultivation**

The Nurturing Mothers, Warm-Chamber Maidens, and New Wives—twenty-four each in their respective groups—descend to the petitioner’s silkworm chamber, ensuring warmth and protection, so that the silkworms flourish, their silk yields multiply ten thousandfold, and none suffer harm.

**Melons, Gourds, and Field Cultivation**
For all manner of fieldwork, the appointed palace overseers are summoned. The Lords of the Four, Five, and Seven Wilds, along with the Lord of the Level City, the Mountain and River Spirits, the Gods of Millet and Soil, and the Pillars of the Hall are invoked.

The White Silkworm Lord governs the protection of the Five Grains, ensuring stalks and sprouts thrive, seeds form and ripen, and harvests multiply ten thousandfold.

The Lords of the Nine Wilds, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Palace of Earth’s Exhaustion, overseeing the myriad people’s fieldwork for profit, so that no pests harm the crops and deer flee, yielding a hundredfold return.

The Lords of the Five Grains, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Great Water Palace, presiding over the myriad people’s Five Grains. The soil is easily tilled, stalks and sprouts flourish, and deep-rooted boars, bears, swift pests, and locusts are expelled, their swarms dispersed, yielding a hundredfold harvest.

The Lords of the Heavenly Fields, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Palace of Earth’s Chamber, overseeing the myriad people’s grain cultivation, ensuring abundant yields.

The Lords of the Five Fields and Outer Fields, along with the Lord of the Level Nine Wilds, personally manage the year-end cultivation of the Five Grains. Now, as customs grow strange and deceitful, a *hu* of horse grain is taken as earnest faith.

The Lords of the Five Thousand Kings, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Chamber of the Nine Waters, overseeing the myriad people’s fieldwork techniques.

The Lords of the Six Livestock, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Hall of Light, presiding over the myriad people’s melons and gourds, ensuring their seeds yield double, with no death or harm.

**Journeys of Ten Thousand *Li***
The Lords of the Ten Thousand *Li*, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Chamber of *Qi* under the name of the Proclaimed Ancestor, overseeing the myriad people’s journeys of ten thousand *li*, so that roads in all four directions are open and no misfortune or calamity is encountered.

The Northern Horse Lord, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Chamber of the Inner Chamber, ensuring that generals and commanders on distant journeys evade capture by corrupt officials, traveling lightly and swiftly for a thousand *li*.

The Jade Maidens of the Hall of Light, one thousand two hundred in number, clad in white, oversee the protection of travelers on journeys of ten thousand *li*, averting calamities and resolving difficulties.

The Lords of Myriad Blessings, with one hundred twenty officers, protect the myriad people on journeys of ten thousand *li*, smoothing the roads, turning death into life, transforming misfortune into fortune, dispelling disasters and slayings, ensuring safe passage and return, and fulfilling every thought and desire of the heart.

**Market Deceit and Fraud**
The Gatekeepers of Post Stations and Market Overseers, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Heavenly Market Chamber, capturing harmful ghosts throughout the world, investigating and punishing those who generate calamities—slaughterers, wine-sellers, and shopkeepers who sell to the poor and common folk—while secretly using light scales and small measures to deceive and defraud.

The Twenty-Eight Officers of the Supreme Lord of Myriad Blessings seek the five profits—gold, silver, cloth, silk, grain, rice, money, and goods—so that whatever is desired arrives, and whatever is sought is obtained, overseeing the summoning of wealth and the pursuit of profit.

The Northern Prosperity and Blindness Lord, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Northern Water Chamber, overseeing waterborne merchants who falsify weights and measures, selling at a profit through deceit and fraud in the marketplace, all of which are investigated and corrected.

The Supreme Lords of Myriad Blessings, with one hundred twenty officers, oversee the pursuit of the five profits—gold, silver, and cloth—so that whatever is desired is obtained, and whatever is wished for is fulfilled.

The Lords of the Heavenly River, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Chamber of the Nine Rivers, recording and encouraging the River Earl to renew the waters for rest, without adding to the three auxiliary measures of Zhang, the three hooks, or the three teachings of Xun Qing.

**Rebels Seeking Return to the Dao**
The Lords of Transformative *Qi*, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Crimson Rabbit Chamber, reclaiming rebellious subjects and restoring them to the Dao, ensuring no delays in their return.

The Lords of the Nine Convergences, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Returning Residence Master, summoning officials from the Nine Heavens to descend and transform the people of the lower realm, restoring them to the Dao.

The Lords of the Nine Convergences, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Returning Residence Master, summoning officials from the Nine Heavens to investigate and reclaim the households of rebellious subjects.

**Libationers and the Opening of Hearts**
The Lords of the Master, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Purple Tenuity Canopy Chamber, overseeing the male and female officials, libationers, and the hearts and minds of the young and ignorant, transforming them into sages and dispelling demonic speech.

The Jade Immortal Lords, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Great Simplicity, overseeing female officials, libationers, and the hearts and minds of the young and ignorant, transforming them into sages and enabling them to recognize demonic women.

The Lords of the Five Classics’ Transformative *Qi*, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Chamber of the Nine Marvels, overseeing libationers and the young and ignorant, ensuring they receive instruction of their own accord.

If the people open their hearts and thoughts to clarity, distinguishing themselves from the multitude, they may petition the Two Officers of the Five Planets, with one hundred twenty officers, to descend and enter their bodies.

Petition the Lords of the Eight Extremities of the Circumpolar Heavens, along with the twelve officers of the Left and Right, Yin and Yang, and the Bright Sequence, to descend and unite with their bodies, settling their hidden intentions and steadfast resolve.

**Entering Mountains Without Thirst**
The Lords of the Heavenly Canopy, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Chamber of the Dao Gate, overseeing the invocation of mountain spirits and masters to enter famous mountains, where the Dao may be attained. The Jade Maidens and Plain Maidens preside over this.

The Twelve Longevity Officers of Green City, clad in red and patterned silk, ensure that masters live one hundred twenty years before entering famous mountains.

The Five Left and Right Officers of the Sated, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the suppression of the Three Corpses, enabling people to live without hunger or thirst and attain longevity.

The Lords of the King’s Domain Traveling Kitchen, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Chamber of the King’s Gate, enabling masters to refine *qi* and abstain from food and hunger, entering famous mountains without need of provisions, their spirits vast and their youths unburdened.

The Lords of the Golden Granary, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Divine Sovereign’s Chamber, providing grain and *qi* so that one may enter famous mountains without hunger or thirst, ascending to the offices of immortals in harmony with *qi*.

The Lords of Heavenly Regulation, twenty in number, govern the Chamber of the Venerable One, overseeing the sacrifice to the Heavenly Officials. The Daoist ghosts and their names are distinguished, and the *qi* of the libationer masters who attain the Dao descends to the encamped spirits, who preside over their differentiation.

The Five Heavenly Reliance Lords govern the Chamber of the Five Celestial Bodies, overseeing the master’s guardianship of the Central Spirit, granting wishes for beauty, youthful appearance, and renewed vigor with each passing day.
chunks.overlap_context: Reverent Feeding Lords, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Bright Silken Chamber, ensuring the myriad people’s silkworms thrive in their resting and rising, their luster abundant, and their silk produced as desired. The Provisioning Lords, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Heavenly Emolument Palace, resolving the food of the myriad people’s silkworms, and the divine boys and girls—Jade Boys and Girls, White Boys and Girls, Mysterious Boys and Girls—who nurture the silkworms.

chunks.original_text: 天倚国君五人，治五辰室，主籍师五精守中神，还精美色丁庄。 华景君官将一百二十人，治白玄室，主师入山，精思，面七曰念面色土水上无还，年不老阴阳炁备之。 五瘟伤寒 计天君官将一百二十人，治六丁室，主收连藉伤寒，思炁历乱。 地官督炁君五人，官将一百二十人，治上文室，市中五瘟伤寒男子疾病。 地城伐吏五人，官将一百二十人，治难室，主收治某里五瘟伤寒，女子复连疾病。 运炁解厄君兵士十万，辟斥五瘟伤寒，功时破杀之鬼。 五瘟都炁兵士四十万人，主收恶炁五瘟伤寒鬼杀之炁。 北阙九夷君五人，官将一百二十人，治大苗室，主收里中伤寒狼藉，吏民被狂惑。 北里太皇君五人，官将一百二十人，治行室，主收里中伤寒披发。 咽喉翁天市大夫君一人，官将一百二十人，治成室，太祖讳臣胤生主治万民复连伤寒绝音不能语。 振夫大兵十万人，赤积天冠，主收天下自称五色瘟病之鬼。 百神炁君一人，官将一百二十人，治难室，主收天下五瘟伤寒，鬼病人者。 北阙九夷君官将一百二十人，治天戴宝，主收市里伤寒病疾，吏民披发，狂足忌骂言错乱。 讨天君官将一百二十人，治六丁室，主收疾病时瘟毒之鬼，若在船上得属者伤寒，连病相易五瘟之鬼。 北域贼君五人，官将一百二十人，主治热病亡一商语之鬼。 北城九夷君官将一百二十人，治满室，主收船车伤寒相连，历疾病狂忽，喉壅身灾。 北炁大机君五人，官将一百二十人，治大行室，主收五瘟伤寒时热之病。 正一法文经章官品卷之一竟 正一法文经章官品卷之二
chunks.translated_text:
The Five Heavenly Reliance Lords of the State, five in number, govern the Chamber of the Five Celestial Bodies, overseeing the master’s registration of the Five Essences to guard the Central Spirit, returning essence to refine beauty and attain flourishing vitality.

The Lords of Radiant Splendor, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Chamber of White Mystery, overseeing the master’s entry into mountains for refined contemplation. After seven days of focused meditation, the complexion becomes as earth and water—unyielding and ever-renewing—so that age does not advance and the *qi* of yin and yang is complete.

The Five Pestilential Fevers and Cold Damage:
The Lords of Celestial Calculation, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Chamber of the Six *Ding*, overseeing the collection of interconnected cold damage and disordered *qi* from contemplation.

The Earthly Lords of Supervising *Qi*, five in number, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Chamber of Supreme Script, overseeing the markets and the five pestilential fevers and cold damage afflicting men.

The Earthly Executioners of the City Walls, five in number, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Chamber of Adversity, overseeing the collection and treatment of the five pestilential fevers and cold damage in specific districts, along with recurring illnesses among women.

The Lord of Circulating *Qi* and Resolving Calamities commands one hundred thousand soldiers to repel and expel the five pestilential fevers and cold damage, destroying the ghosts that bring harm in due time.

The Generals of the Five Pestilences’ Central *Qi* command four hundred thousand soldiers to collect the malevolent *qi* of the five pestilential fevers and cold damage, and to slay the *qi* of their ghosts.

The Lords of the Nine Barbarians of the Northern Gate, five in number, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Chamber of the Great Miao, overseeing the collection of scattered cold damage within districts, where officials and commoners are afflicted by madness and delusion.

The Supreme Lords of the Northern Precinct, five in number, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Chamber of Movement, overseeing the collection of cold damage within districts where people wander with disheveled hair.

The Venerable Elder of the Throat and Celestial Market, Grand Master of the Heavenly Court, one in number, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Chamber of Completion. The Great Ancestor, whose personal name is *Yin Sheng*, oversees the treatment of the myriad people afflicted by recurring cold damage, whose voices are severed and who cannot speak.

The Great Army of the Rousing Husband, one hundred thousand strong, dons crimson-crested celestial crowns to collect the ghosts of the five-colored pestilential diseases that manifest throughout the world.

The Lord of the Hundred Spirits’ *Qi*, one in number, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Chamber of Adversity, overseeing the collection of the five pestilential fevers and cold damage that afflict people as ghostly illnesses throughout the world.

The Lords of the Nine Barbarians of the Northern Gate, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Chamber of Heaven-Bearing Treasure, overseeing the collection of cold damage and illnesses within markets and districts, where officials and commoners wander with disheveled hair, maddened steps, taboo-breaking speech, and confused words.

The Lords of Celestial Punishment, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Chamber of the Six *Ding*, overseeing the collection of the ghosts of seasonal pestilential toxins and illnesses. If one contracts cold damage while aboard a ship, the affliction spreads through contagion, and the ghosts of the five pestilences are transmitted.

The Lords of the Northern Wastes, five in number, with one hundred twenty officers, oversee the treatment of the ghosts of heat illnesses that cause merchants to perish with a single utterance.

The Lords of the Nine Barbarians of the Northern Walls, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Chamber of Fullness, overseeing the collection of interconnected cold damage from ships and carriages, along with illnesses marked by sudden madness, throat obstructions, and bodily calamities.

The Great Lords of Northern *Qi* and the Celestial Mechanism, five in number, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Chamber of the Great Passage, overseeing the collection of the five pestilential fevers, cold damage, and seasonal heat illnesses.

Thus concludes the first scroll of the *Official Ranks of the Scriptural Texts of Orthodox Unity*.
Here begins the second scroll of the *Official Ranks of the Scriptural Texts of Orthodox Unity*.

chunks.original_text: 收万精鬼 破逆君将一百二十人，治汉仙室，主百姓男女病精魅中刑犯易，披发狂走还格，因称神鬼语称和言皆主之。 天乐君五人，官将一百二十人，治五水室，主收治女子狂易披发。 奔走天地精君官将一百二十人，苗林宫收治男女披发狂易之病主之。 大角狱君官将一百二十人，治五大行宫，主收天下有物万精来着人者，除灭之。 高脊君官将一百二十人，治寄明宫，主收天下龙蛇灾害人者。 实地君一人、官将一百二十人、治文宫，主收考地上兽之精，诸道行逆劫真强病之。 九天前司马千二百人、绛衣赤积，主收天下木石之精魅。 胡将军千二百人，各将胡兵士十万人，主能收天地身称为道五龙之精考之。 九谏君一人，官将一百二十人，治成信宫，主收天下自称河伯水龙蛇之精，病人者主之。 北玄君一人，官将一百二十人，治皇宫，主收龙蛇精老虎精主之。 三炁赐功君一人，官将一百二十人，治黄云室，主收天下老鼠之精魅，病人者主之。 山秦皇老君一人，官将一百二十人，治地室，主天下崖石之精主之。 旌明中彻君一人，官将一百二十人，治俗室，收天下万物之精魅主之。 明郎君一人，官将一百二十人，治安庄室，主收天下自称妖精为毒害诸精。 天封大兵士十万人，黄衣，收龙蛇之精，狂歌自为之神主者。 泽明都君一人，官将一百二十人，主治天五平室，主天下自称考神蛇雀石草木精魅。 广老君一人，官将一百二十人，治仓室，主收天下锋蜂蚜召之鬼，主治百精。 主治颠痒 地黄君官将一百二十人，治女颠狂病，狂一古之脆绢谷。 天门大营君官将一百二十人，治太上室，治男女颠狂瘾病主之。 土阳君一人，官将一百二十人，治闻空，主收捐天杀马痒病之鬼主治之。 非门君一人，官将一百二十人，治安乐室，收捕天下八节十二辰，能治颠病之鬼。 地门君天营五人，官将一百二十人，主治女子雉躏颠病。 地星营星官将一百二十人，治上灵室，主治惊狂之鬼。 天玄关闭君一人，官将一百二十人，治星机官，主男女狂易之论。 天乐君官将一百二十人，治五九室，主治女子狂易被发呼走之病。 治目病 左右青田君一人，主典治目痛，目痛令三日除差鬼消灭。 阳天君主治男女徽日之痛，主治之除差，舟明君一人，官将一百二十人，治孔次室，主治目窦海出督十岁之病可治之。 百玄玉女二百人，持神方艮药，主治男子目窦之病。 大明君一人，官将一百二十人，治明堂，治男子目海生督十岁之病治之。 注变君官将一百二十人，治高夏室，主治目病，主治之逆注君，治右室目病令人除差。 明镜君官将一百二十人，治关阳室，主两目睡子精，视万里，目见形影，知吉凶。 日月君官将一百二十人，治欣室，主治吏民目海生笃病十成治之。 天厌君黑衣兵士十万人，主收一百二十人并鳌鬼，令人生目之目今立差。 天明君五人，官将一百二十人，治男室，主治男子左目，生目之目，今差面目上诸毒立差。 地明君五人，官将一百二十人，治北室，生男女子左目之目今差。 天痴君黑衣兵士十万人，主收一百二十人鳌鬼病人，目生目主治差。 明君五人官将一百二十人治北室，主治男女目痛今差。 治耳聋 天寿君一人，官将一百二十人，治仙贡室，主治男子聋十岁主治之。
chunks.translated_text:
The Lords of Breaking Rebellion, one hundred twenty officers in number, govern the Chamber of Han Immortals, overseeing the collection of the myriad essence-spirits. They preside over the afflictions of common folk—men and women—stricken by essence-demons, suffering from punishments, exchanges of fate, or those who tear their hair in madness, run wildly, and return in frenzy, uttering divine or ghostly words, or speaking harmonious yet eerie phrases.

The Lords of Celestial Music, five in number, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Chamber of the Five Waters, overseeing the collection and treatment of women afflicted with madness, tearing their hair in frenzy.

The Lords of the Essence-Spirits of Heaven and Earth, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Miao-Lin Palace, overseeing the collection and treatment of men and women suffering from madness and tearing their hair in frenzy.

The Lords of the Great Horn Prison, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Five Great Passage Palaces, overseeing the collection of all things under heaven—myriad essence-spirits that cling to people—and their eradication.

The Lords of the Lofty Ridge, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Palace of Lodged Brilliance, overseeing the collection of dragons and serpents that bring calamity to people.

The Lord of Solid Earth, one in number, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Palace of Scriptures, overseeing the examination of earthly beast-essences and the afflictions caused by those who travel the Dao in rebellion, robbing the true and strong.

The Marshals of the Nine Heavens’ Forefront, one thousand two hundred in number, clad in crimson robes with red sashes, oversee the collection of essence-demons from trees and stones under heaven.

The Hu Generals, one thousand two hundred in number, each commanding one hundred thousand Hu soldiers, oversee the collection and examination of the essence-spirits of heaven and earth that call themselves the Five Dragons of the Dao.

The Lord of Nine Admonitions, one in number, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Palace of Accomplished Trust, overseeing the collection of all under heaven who falsely claim to be River Lords, water dragons, or serpent-essences that afflict people.

The Lord of Northern Mystery, one in number, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Imperial Palace, overseeing the collection of dragon, serpent, and tiger essences.

The Lord of the Three *Qi* Bestowed Merit, one in number, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Yellow Cloud Chamber, overseeing the collection of rat-essence demons that afflict people under heaven.

The Old Lord of the Mountainous Qin, one in number, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Earth Chamber, overseeing the essence-spirits of cliffs and stones under heaven.

The Lord of Radiant Clarity Through the Center, one in number, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Common Chamber, overseeing the collection of the myriad essence-spirits under heaven.

The Bright Gentleman, one in number, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Chamber of Peaceful Abode, overseeing the collection of all under heaven who falsely claim to be malevolent essence-spirits causing poisonous harm.

The Celestial Sealed Great Soldiers, one hundred thousand in number, clad in yellow, oversee the collection of dragon and serpent essences that sing wildly and claim divinity.

The Governor of the Marsh Brilliance Capital, one in number, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Celestial Five Level Chamber, overseeing those under heaven who falsely claim to be divine serpents, magpies, stone, grass, or tree essence-demons.

The Venerable Elder, one in number, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Granary Chamber, overseeing the collection of the ghosts of wasps, bees, aphids, and summons, and the governance of the hundred essences.

**Overseeing the Treatment of Madness and Itching:**
The Lords of Earth’s Yellow, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the treatment of women’s mad frenzies, their madness as fragile as ancient silk or valley grains.

The Lords of the Great Camp of the Celestial Gate, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Chamber of the Supreme, overseeing the treatment of men and women’s mad frenzies and addiction diseases.

The Lord of Earth’s Yang, one in number, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Chamber of Echoing Void, overseeing the collection and treatment of ghosts that harm heaven, kill horses, and cause itching diseases.

The Lord of the Non-Gate, one in number, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Chamber of Peace and Joy, overseeing the capture of ghosts under heaven across the eight nodes and twelve celestial stems that cause mad diseases.

The Lords of the Celestial Camp of the Earth Gate, five in number, with one hundred twenty officers, oversee the treatment of women’s pheasant-stumbling mad diseases.

The Stellar Officers of the Earth Star Camp, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Upper Numinous Chamber, overseeing the treatment of fright-madness ghosts.

The Lord of the Celestial Mysterious Pass Closure, one in number, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Stellar Mechanism Palace, overseeing the deliberations on men and women’s mad exchanges.

The Lords of Celestial Music, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Chamber of the Five Nines, overseeing the treatment of women’s mad frenzies, tearing their hair and running in wild cries.

**Overseeing the Treatment of Eye Diseases:**
The Lords of the Left and Right Azure Fields, one in number, oversee the governance and treatment of eye pain, eliminating the ghosts that cause it within three days.

The Lord of Yang Heaven oversees the treatment of men and women’s hidden eye pains, governing their cure.

The Lord of Boat Brilliance, one in number, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Chamber of Sequential Apertures, overseeing the treatment of eye sockets flowing with supervisors for ten years, which can be cured.

The Two Hundred Jade Maidens of the Hundred Mysteries, bearing divine prescriptions and potent medicines, oversee the treatment of men’s eye socket diseases.

The Great Bright Lord, one in number, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Hall of Brilliance, overseeing the treatment of men’s eye sockets producing supervisors for ten years.

The Lords of Pouring Transformation, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Chamber of Lofty Summer, overseeing the treatment of eye diseases. The Lords of Counterflow govern the Right Chamber, treating eye diseases and ensuring their cure.

The Lords of the Bright Mirror, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Chamber of the Pass Yang, overseeing the pupils of both eyes, enabling vision across ten thousand *li*, perceiving forms and shadows, and discerning fortune and misfortune.

The Lords of the Sun and Moon, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Chamber of Joy, overseeing the treatment of officials and commoners’ eye sockets producing severe diseases, curing ten out of ten cases.

The Lord of Heaven’s Disdain, clad in black with one hundred thousand soldiers, oversees the collection of one hundred twenty turtle-shell ghosts, instantly curing the eyes they afflict.

The Lords of Celestial Brilliance, five in number, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Male Chamber, overseeing the treatment of men’s left eyes, curing the eyes and all poisons on the face.

The Lords of Earth’s Brilliance, five in number, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Northern Chamber, curing the left eyes of men and women.

The Lord of Heaven’s Folly, clad in black with one hundred thousand soldiers, oversees the collection of one hundred twenty turtle-shell ghosts that afflict people’s eyes, governing their cure.

The Bright Lords, five in number, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Northern Chamber, overseeing the treatment of men and women’s eye pains, ensuring their cure.

**Overseeing the Treatment of Deafness:**
The Lord of Celestial Longevity, one in number, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Chamber of Immortal Tribute, overseeing the treatment of men’s deafness for ten years.

The Great Lords of Northern *Qi* and the Celestial Mechanism, five in number, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Chamber of the Great Passage, overseeing the collection of the five pestilential fevers, cold damage, and seasonal heat illnesses.

Thus concludes the first scroll of the *Official Ranks of the Scriptural Texts of Orthodox Unity*.

chunks.original_text: 天鼓君官将一百二十人，治大素室，主治男女子暗聋主治之。 天尊君官将一百二十人，治仙真，主治男子女耳聋十岁不闻言语治之。 治齿颊喉痛 元计君左右二十四人，主治男女齿今差。 元和君官将一百二十人，主治男女口齿颊肿，口中生恶疮主治之。 百吉君官将一百二十人，治项安君主治之齿疮，劫咽中瘾治之。 九焦君五人，官将一百二十人，治九节宫，主治男女口齿，劲咽中痛今差。 天九候君官将一百二十人，主治男子咽喉肿痛，舌强黑结主之。 地八节君官将一百二十人，主治女子咽喉肿痛，舌强，炁结主之。 治解社灶 太上剪板兵十万人，主为万民收解天下一百二十人井鳌鬼，为人作精祟断之。 周天玉女千二百人，赤衣三环角结，主男女百病鳌鬼所为。 平神君官将一百二十人，治阳照宫，主收解社鳌，未害人者分别之。 无上太衡兵士十万人，主解星社来作祟病者，捉劫社神解放生魂还附之身中，不得拘摄，永相去离，分别鬼祟，绝断耗害除劫，须散之。 主法君五人，官将一百二十人，治五姓宫，主治男子面身体生疮瘫，犯十二訾。 灶火玉女千二百人，赤衣，收一百二十人鳌祟病人者。 主解虫鼠精怪 三炁阳无元君官将一百二十人，治黄灵室，主收精怪之精。 南山白虎将吏，主收除宅内群鼠犯害驱离，无令留停。 治劫杀注 无上化不君兵士十万人，收一百二斗注鬼杀炁，却死来生主之。 无上万官君兵士十万人，收地上逆淫注炁消灭。 无上平天君兵士十万人，主收天下一百二十人殃注鬼杀，在人身中者消灭之。 部吏赤天道室考骑老逆将军二人，太君二人，都官从事老对杀君，各有种数千人，不营守某家保护男女，若牙身中除去死籍，更迎生名捕死者，某死生注清浊之炁，破杀尸殃之恩，得老稚正法髡笞五百，斩杀有罪，死合平复连更相牵引。 治解牢狱 尊神斩斧疾汤部君，又请颠倒将军，绝断将军，出囚出魂将军，收熙出炁将军，出徙囚系将军，收符拾传将军，合下速为解脱牢狱效。 治蛇蜕五毒 山夷君官将一百二十人，治令仓室，主收阮蛇毒蛊，山中万兽虎狼精毒炁，杀消灭之。 先生君一人，官将一百二十人，治神水室，主为万民医治蛇阮五毒精杀不得行，主收某身中五毒之鬼，虫蛇喷人，毒入腹中，毒炁不行，今差之。 天上白蛇君三十九人，收万民为蛇毒之鬼所中，便得炁不行。 治肿瘫鼠漏 地八节君官将一百二十人，治大丹室，主治女身烂喉肿各强炁之病。 白玄解激君一人，官将一百二十人，治阴明室，主治女晨夜音喉翁恶赤治之。 地天冢君官将一百二十人，治九汉室，主治女子得瘤疽下血主治之。 天覆君五人，官将一百二十人，治周星室，主治男子颈翕血主治之。 九天九病君官将一百二十人，治下冢室，主治男子喉翁舌强主治之。 省炁君官将一百二十人，治七灵，治万民翕瘫脆水病主之。 天覆君官将一百二十人，治周星，主治男子颈瘫夜下血鼠主治之。 九天候君官将一百二十人，治下冢室，治男子喉翁舌强系绝主治之。 地覆君官将一百二十人，治九候室，主治男子颈瘤瘫颗下血鼠漏主治之。 侯君一人，官将一百二十人，治井室，主治女子翁舌病主之。 地八节君一人，官将一百二十人，治五星室，主治男子手足瘫疽，久病不差，魂魄拘系者。
chunks.translated_text:
The Lord of Heavenly Drum, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Chamber of Great Simplicity, overseeing the treatment of men and women’s deaf-muteness.

The Lord of Celestial Honored Ones, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Chamber of Immortal Perfection, overseeing the treatment of men and women’s deafness for ten years, restoring their ability to hear speech.

**Overseeing the Treatment of Tooth, Cheek, and Throat Pain:**
The Lord of Primordial Calculation, with twenty-four attendants on either side, governs the cure of men and women’s tooth ailments.

The Lord of Primordial Harmony, with one hundred twenty officers, oversees the treatment of men and women’s swollen cheeks and teeth, and the malignant sores in their mouths.

The Lord of Hundred Auspices, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the treatment of tooth sores overseen by the Lord of Neck Peace, and the relief of throat obstructions.

The Nine Burners Lords, five in number, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Nine Nodes Palace, overseeing the cure of men and women’s tooth and mouth ailments, and the relief of throat pain.

The Lord of Heaven’s Nine Signs, with one hundred twenty officers, oversees the treatment of men’s swollen and painful throats, stiff and blackened tongues, and bound qi.

The Lords of Earth’s Eight Nodes, with one hundred twenty officers, oversee the treatment of women’s swollen and painful throats, stiff tongues, and bound qi.

**Overseeing the Resolution of Earth Altars and Stoves:**
The Supreme Lord’s Shearing Board Soldiers, one hundred thousand in number, collect and resolve the one hundred twenty well-turtle-shell ghosts afflicting the world, severing the spectral afflictions they cause among the people.

The Twelve Hundred Jade Maidens of the Celestial Circuit, clad in red with triple-coiled horned knots, govern the myriad ailments caused by turtle-shell ghosts in men and women.

The Lord of Spirit Pacification, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Radiant Yang Palace, overseeing the resolution of earth-altar turtle-shell spirits before they harm people.

The Supreme Lord’s Unsurpassed Balance Soldiers, one hundred thousand in number, resolve the spectral afflictions caused by star-altar spirits, capturing and releasing the bound spirits to rejoin their bodies, preventing further restraint. They sever the ties of spectral harm, dispelling depletion and calamity, and dissolving the afflictions.

The Lords of Governing Law, five in number, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Five Lineages Palace, overseeing the treatment of men’s facial and bodily sores, paralysis, and the twelve malevolent afflictions.

The Twelve Hundred Stove-Fire Jade Maidens, clad in red, collect the one hundred twenty turtle-shell spirits afflicting people.

**Overseeing the Resolution of Insect and Rat Specters:**
The Lord of Three Qi’s Yang Primordial, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Yellow Spirit Chamber, overseeing the collection of spectral essences.

The White Tiger Generals and Officers of Southern Mountain expel and banish the rats within dwellings that cause harm, ensuring they do not linger.

**Overseeing the Resolution of Violent Death and Karmic Afflictions:**
The Supreme Lord of Ineffable Transformation’s Soldiers, one hundred thousand in number, collect the one hundred twenty bushels of karmic affliction ghosts and violent qi, reversing death and restoring life.

The Supreme Lord of Myriad Offices’ Soldiers, one hundred thousand in number, collect and dissolve the rebellious and licentious karmic qi upon the earth.

The Supreme Lord of Celestial Pacification’s Soldiers, one hundred thousand in number, collect and dissolve the one hundred twenty karmic affliction ghosts of violent death residing within people.

The Department Officers of the Crimson Heavenly Dao Chamber, the Two Generals of the Old Rebel Cavalry, the Two Supreme Lords, the Capital Officers, the Attending Old Adversary Executioner Lords—each with their respective legions of thousands—do not guard any particular household but protect men and women. If the fangs reside within the body, they remove the name from the register of the dead and instead welcome the name of the living, capturing the dead. They discern the purity and turbidity of the qi of life and death, severing the bonds of karmic calamity and violent death. Those who receive the proper punishment of five hundred tonsure lashes, or execution for their crimes, shall be restored to life, their karmic ties dissolved, and their mutual entanglements undone.

**Overseeing the Resolution of Imprisonment:**
The Venerable Divine Lord of the Axe and Swift Decoction Department, along with the Generals of Inversion, Severance, Prisoner Release, Soul Liberation, Qi Extraction, Prisoner Transfer, and Talisman Collection—together they swiftly resolve and release those bound in prison.

**Overseeing the Treatment of Snake Molts and Five Poisons:**
The Lords of Mountain Barbarians, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Granary Chamber, overseeing the collection and dissolution of snake toxins, gu poisons, and the toxic qi of mountain beasts such as tigers and wolves.

The Master Lord, one in number, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Divine Water Chamber, providing medical treatment for the people against the five poisons of snakes, gu, and spectral killings, preventing their spread. They collect the five-poison ghosts within the body, the venomous bites of insects and snakes that enter the abdomen, halting the flow of toxic qi and effecting a cure.

The Thirty-Nine Lords of Heavenly White Snakes collect those among the people afflicted by snake-toxin ghosts, restoring the flow of qi.

**Overseeing the Treatment of Swellings, Paralysis, and Rat Fistulas:**
The Lords of Earth’s Eight Nodes, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Great Cinnabar Chamber, overseeing the treatment of women’s rotting throats, swollen throats, and bound-qi ailments.

The Lord of White Profundity’s Resolving Swiftness, one in number, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Yin Bright Chamber, overseeing the treatment of women’s nighttime throat ailments, hoarseness, and redness.

The Lords of Earth’s Heavenly Mound, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Nine Han Chamber, overseeing the treatment of women’s tumors, carbuncles, and lower-bleeding ailments.

The Heaven-Covering Lords, five in number, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Circumpolar Star Chamber, overseeing the treatment of men’s neck swellings and blood ailments.

The Lords of the Nine Heavens’ Nine Ailments, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Lower Mound Chamber, overseeing the treatment of men’s throat hoarseness and stiff tongues.

The Lord of Qi Inspection, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Seven Spirits, overseeing the treatment of the people’s swollen paralysis and brittle-water ailments.

The Heaven-Covering Lords, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Circumpolar Star Chamber, overseeing the treatment of men’s neck paralysis and nighttime lower-bleeding rat fistulas.

The Lords of the Nine Heavens’ Signs, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Lower Mound Chamber, overseeing the treatment of men’s throat hoarseness, stiff tongues, and severed qi.

The Earth-Covering Lords, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Nine Signs Chamber, overseeing the treatment of men’s neck tumors, paralysis, and lower-bleeding rat fistulas.

The Lord of Signs, one in number, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Well Chamber, overseeing the treatment of women’s throat and tongue ailments.

The Lord of Earth’s Eight Nodes, one in number, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Five Stars Chamber, overseeing the treatment of men’s hand and foot paralysis, carbuncles, and long-standing ailments that do not heal, where the hun and po souls are bound.

chunks.original_text: 治风痹痿 赤舌君官将一百二十人，治上俗室，主治女子大风治死饥令差。 黑炁温水君官将一百二十人，主治女子大风死饥病主治之。 起炁君五人，官将一百二十人，治安平安，主治人痿跛偏枯主治之。 天水君五人，官将一百二十人，治上俗室，主治女子大风病邪主之。 起地君五人，官将一百二十人，治上三千室，主治女子四肢偏枯痿黄令差。 交路君五人，官将一百二十人，主男女苦雨肌上炁风痹，两脚上不随，疼痛不能行步。 治久病淋露 五很君官将一百二十人，治久病淋露。 当骨消定痛水邪、灭百病痛。 七政君官将一百二十人，治阳室，主天下阴阳官吏病稽留，令差主治之。 白玄宅炁君五人，官将一百二十人，治太真室，主治女子十岁落病，连漆收骨治之差。 主君官将一百二十人，治玄胎星，主收捕某身中担病之鬼，着床卧来为精屯稽留不差者。 主治疟病 仓母君五人，官将一百二十人，主治男子疟病之鬼作沉重主令消灭之。 中室玄武疟吏婴儿一合下并力主治男子疟病鬼令差。 治男女百病 地戾营君五人，官将一百二十人治上室主治男女百病之鬼令差。 经官素女千二百人，同还结忌主固，治男女百病令差。 天地强乱君一人，官将一百二十人，治正室，主为师复连痛炁历禁锢之鬼。 按摩君一人，官将一百二十人，治阳明室，主治男女四肢疼痛主治之。 犯天正乱君一人，官将一百二十人，治端正室，主师治人之久病不差，炁错不同主之。 魄天君五人，官将一百二十人，主治男女病关节令差。 颈无礼君功曹五人，官将一百二十人，主治男女腰膝病治之。 盖化司侯君三祖九和，主人吐病令差。 盖地司侯君三祖九和、主解治之吐病之鬼。 八风周害君吏一百二十人，主治君病一目，治男子百脉病。 天君阴阳林君官将吏左右一百二十人，治男子黄疸病。 九向北海君主治男子病水之鬼令立差。 太阴君一人，官将一百二十人，治兰室，主治男女惊病之鬼 九河北海君官将一百二十人，治河元室，主治男女病，小腹之痛令立差，主水能前医所不治者。 天官五行君官将一百二十人，治大比丘平室，主男女吸咄不能匡义，腹中痛令立差。 地官五行君官将一百二十人，治太室，主吸咄不能饮食匡义，腹中痛令立差。 天官五行三五七九君官将一百二十人，主治男女阴阳闭塞不通，利肿痛生疮主治之。 九河君官将一百二十人，主治男女大小便不通主治之。 封离君十二人，主男女心腹痛，脐下便拘急激，满带下十二之鬼主之也。 省玉君官将一百二十人，治七令室，主治男女头脊肿痛生疮令差。 脆巨炭纸笔等官君五人，官将一百二十人，主治男肩臂手肿令差。 天倾君官将一百二十人，治五炁室，主治女子下赤白昼夜不止，十二病绝嗣。 言生君官将一百二十人，治安乐室，主天下云中一百二十神三十六主病，某心腹背脊四肢骨节戴眼吐沬，口禁惊掣之鬼，收除之。 赤选君五人，主摄四面八方之鬼。 婴向君二十人，主收食云中闭一切消灭。 刚强吏兵主典治云中所病之鬼，主为某身收掠除十二时鬼消除之地灰，荣感五人官将一百二十人，治太上中室，主治某身所苦云中病灭之。 石明君官将一百二十人，治执治室，主诛除符病饮食精魅之鬼，为某收捐邪鬼主立解除之。
chunks.translated_text:
The Crimson-Tongued Lord, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Upper Common Chamber, overseeing the treatment of women’s severe wind afflictions that lead to death by starvation, ensuring their recovery.

The Black Qi Warm Water Lord, with one hundred twenty officers, oversees the treatment of women’s severe wind afflictions and starvation-induced ailments.

The Qi-Raising Lords, five in number, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Chamber of Peace and Tranquility, overseeing the treatment of human atrophy, lameness, hemiplegia, and withered limbs.

The Celestial Water Lords, five in number, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Upper Common Chamber, overseeing the treatment of women’s severe wind afflictions and malevolent influences.

The Earth-Raising Lords, five in number, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Upper Three Thousand Chamber, overseeing the treatment of women’s hemiplegia, atrophy, and jaundice, ensuring their recovery.

chunks.original_text: 朱都主官将一百二十人治芦阳室，主天下万魅百精灾某身者，收邪鬼等病者为某摧灭之。 保产生胎妊 阳炁君官将一百二十人，治经室，主保女子产解易儿时出，母子无它留难。 听敌君官将一百二十人，治平害室，主为郎差女性受命、令怀妊无它主之。 婴儿乳母吏主乳某胎儿，使调畅交好。 护胎吏主护某胎成，日月成满，坚固受炁，万产医吏辅易某身，使差速易，母子端正，度脱无他。 考召考官吏主收解宅内四面土炁，破射防害杀炁，消灭身无宅胎妊安稳。 期文君官将一百二十人，治小仙室，主女子产乳难，子横胎中，病风面以时下之。 主治杂病 白玄炁君一人，官将一百二十人，治父王室，主治大子落病生治之。 四明君一人，官将一百二十人，治下食室，主治男女死饥病主治之。 夫玄君莹官将一百二十人，治含威室，生渴男女消渴赢格治之。 男阳君一人，官将一百二十人，治河仓室，主小儿厌赤阳黄常淋露三年主治之。 婴儿君一人，官将一百二十人，治河仓室，主小儿厌赤阳常淋露三年主治之。 天灵天童君一人，官将一百二十人，治高平中室，主扶冻。 东王陵君五人，官将一百二十人，主治逆炁令差。 太衡君五人，官将一百二十人，治凶至室，治男女过地星路，吸咄主治之。 督金君官将一百二十人，治卢黄室，治男女积微露之踵主治之。 救欺君一人，官将一百二十人，治仓明室，主治百姓破堕不利救护之。 解患君官将一百二十人，治下仓室，主为民解宅破堕不正者主之。 南上君官将一百二十人，治食果室，主开主门，盖人寿长令短三日差去，非痊不得病人，胸胁天昌君黄衣兵十万人，主为收除宅中一百二十人殃怪，中外殊殃十二刑杀之鬼来作恶梦怪病者除之。 东明大夫君治天帝室，道来宣讳上字三风随恶精痊留病主治之。 治众疾病 老毒君官将一百二十人，治赤白室，主收千二邪因及逆不正之祟鬼。 中央天兵士十万人，赤积君主收捕绪帅行刑，及返逆不正者。 九天九丈人兵士各十万人，主治地留室，主男女十岁淋露病下，此神收察中牢狱。 地五行君官将一百二十人，治木室，主治女子同带下癖淋露咄吸并主治之。 天五行平君官将一百二十人，治丘平室，主治男过下浅癖淋露吸吐主治之。 三祖君天翁祠母五人，官将一百二十人，治消各祖山室，主父随所在。 天功君左右王侯各二十四吏，治男女色美，主治之天官阴阳狄君官将一百二十人速炁吏左右七十一人主治赢病。 右续令天三人即千船治急病攻心，欲绝主治之。 扶清太一公华盖君二十四官将一百二十人，治三候室九狂心膈。 扶清后部司马和夏君八十四人，官将一百二十人主心府。 治收邪师 扶清东主麸君官将一百二十人，主治逆气令差。 赤师君一人，官将一百二十人，主治女子阴门中下血绝子带下十一时病主治之。 太主星君一人，官将一百二十人，主治逆气令差。 天中国大兵四百万人，主收捕送炁瘴炁。 天上东海赤天内君百万人，主收一百二十符即饮食之鬼。 治收耀鬼 赤天万灵君一人，官将一百二十人，治阳水室，主收天下大逆不正之鬼考治之。 盖天大考将军十万人，主收捕天下饮食横行鬼贼，为人作精祟病人者，收治之。 高麾大鼓五湖将军及甲逆鳞兵士四十万众生，收捕故熙逆鬼行凶者。

The Yellow-Robed Soldiers of the Heavenly Prosperity Lord, one hundred twenty thousand in number, oversee the eradication of the one hundred twenty inauspicious specters within dwellings, as well as external misfortunes and the twelve executioner ghosts that bring nightmares and demonic afflictions.

**Governing Multitudes of Ailments**
The Elder Toxin Lords, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Vermilion-White Chamber, overseeing the capture of the twelve hundred heterodox causes and the eradication of rebellious and unrighteous demonic spirits.

The Earthly Five Agents Lords, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Wood Chamber, overseeing the treatment of women’s concurrent lower abdominal obstructions, dripping discharge, gasping, and choking.

The Heavenly Five Agents Pacifying Lords, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Mound Level Chamber, overseeing the treatment of men’s lower abdominal obstructions, shallow dripping discharge, gasping, and vomiting.

The Three Ancestral Lords and Heavenly Elders, five in number, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Chamber of Dispersing Ancestral Mountains, overseeing the father’s alignment with his proper abode.

The Heavenly Merit Lords, with twenty-four Left and Right Kings and Marquises, govern the enhancement of men’s and women’s beauty.

The Heavenly Official Yin-Yang Di Lords, with one hundred twenty officers, and the Swift Qi Officials, seventy-one on each side, oversee the treatment of emaciating ailments.

The Right Continuation Commanders of Heaven, three in number, oversee the treatment of acute ailments attacking the heart, restoring those on the verge of expiration.

The Supporting Purity Supreme Unity Duke and Canopy Lords, twenty-four in number, with one hundred twenty officers, govern the Three Markers Chamber and the nine frenzied heart obstructions.

The Supporting Purity Rear Department Marshal and Harmonious Summer Lords, eighty-four in number, with one hundred twenty officers, oversee the heart’s palace.

**Governing the Eradication of Heterodox Masters**
The Supporting Purity Eastern Lord of Bran, with one hundred twenty officers, oversees the harmonization of rebellious qi to restore balance.

The Great Soldiers of the Heavenly Central State, four million in number, oversee the capture and expulsion of miasmic qi.

The Heavenly Eastern Sea Vermilion Heavenly Inner Lords, one million in number, oversee the capture of the one hundred twenty talismanic and dietary ghosts.

**Governing the Eradication of Radiant Ghosts**
The Vermilion Heavenly Myriad Spirits Lord, with one hundred twenty officers, governs the Yang Water Chamber, overseeing the capture and interrogation of the world’s great rebels and unrighteous ghosts.

The Heaven-Covering Great Interrogation Generals, one hundred thousand in number, oversee the capture of the world’s dietary and rampant ghostly bandits that afflict people with demonic ailments.

chunks.original_text: 无上黄周君兵一百万人，主收此时司命强杀人之鬼收之。 无上中国大兵士四百万人，主收除邪气妖鬼。 北都君官将一百二十人，主收太岁将军饮食之鬼。 无上四开君兵士十万人，主收破万熙十二逆之鬼。 太上督天兵四十万人，主收自称皇天上帝之鬼。 北上君官将一百二十人，治天留室北斗七星精，共时十二杀。 大傅君官将一百二十人，治西平室，主收某家符广鬼贼上顿人家作状，主责求饮食作害者。 太平君官将一百二十人，治北朔室。 中官君将一百二十人，治阳春室，主收天下六丁六甲之鬼，责民血食之鬼。 北平五门君官将一百二十人，治朱阳室，收自称天地父母，从民责饮食之鬼。 北曹五千君官将一百二十人，治朱阳室，主收天地父母从民责饮食之鬼。 玄天君官将一百二十人，治北都室，主收大岁将军从民求饮食者。 赤王君官将一百二十人，治天北室，主收北时司命从民取食鬼者。 北天君官将一百二十人，治主室，收天下自称五帝饮食之鬼。 九炁君官将一百二十人，治七彻室，主收天下身称天翕，从民求饮食之鬼。 灵官官将一百二十人，治戒室忌，主收自称皇天上帝饮食之鬼。 天愿白候将军兵士十万人，主收自称天地水三官，万道逆杀鬼，考问人不得，从民求饮食。 收考天地破恶大炁兵百众生，主收天下万民二千道千鬼。 百灵君官将一百二十人，治平天室，主收天下五色虫毒之鬼。 无上九天丈人中坚大兵百，主收自称千二道鬼。 天歪大五丁君兵百万人，主收符破庙，多怨坐席血食逆鬼，考责藏不得令脱。 玄老大将军十二人，官将· 一百二十人，主收三官逆炁称神道也。 无上无土君五人，官将一百二十人，主捕收天下众老之精耀神兵称官误号者，又请上千师万聋圣鬼杀消除之。 治暗哑 百舌君一人，官将一百二十人，主治暗哑不能言语，领炁吏平定身中治舌痛。 九炁辈舌君一人，官将一百二十人，主治男女久病咳嗽。 主治男女解罪 辞曹君官将一百二十人，治仙里室，主责疾者辞语，男女大小心化自欺，过手罪差。 素赤君五人，官将一百二十人，治赤虚室，主治男女百病，所苦造逆，思 过改愍复差。 白素君五人，官将一百二十人，和阳室，主治女子百病，所苦告道，道更改心腹差。 天渴者万二千金为祭酒，男女吏兵，文世其罪过，即受此神。 阳先君一人，官将一百二十人，治阳食室，治天下男女百病，取在苦心，神思道即差。 阴先君一人，官将一百二十人，治阳食室，主治天下女子百病，取在苦心，神思道即差。 天仓君一人，官将一百二十人，治天溜室，主天师连历当下此神，兆民病不欲者医治之。 主治解既诅 述炁君官将一百二十人，治素室，主病者中刑犯万国被梼闭固犯易主刑梼。 八卦玄天君官将一百二十人，主收一百二十刑固之鬼全被呎诅病积日不差羸婴着状思道者复不差，请魁魁吏一合下，主收某身中之呎诅盟要恶逆之鬼，强绝之魂魄道不理者，铁钓其分，持天丁甲六千铁杖打杀，无令得脱，晨被刑梼病呎诅，与人相憎戾相咱妬有二心，分居异处，校计不同，首以除差详破殊君一人，官将一百二十人，治在山室，主天下男女解此鬼，令人病者愈起，若为百姓取厌固不利人者。

The Vermilion King Lord’s Officers and Generals, one hundred twenty in number, govern the Celestial Northern Chamber, overseeing the capture of the Northern Controller of Destiny’s ghosts that take food from the people.

The Northern Heaven Lord’s Officers and Generals, one hundred twenty in number, govern the Main Chamber, capturing the world’s ghosts that falsely claim to be the Five Thearchs and extort food.

The Nine Qi Lord’s Officers and Generals, one hundred twenty in number, govern the Sevenfold Penetration Chamber, overseeing the capture of the world’s ghosts who claim the title of Heavenly Xi and extort food from the people.

The Numinous Officials’ Officers and Generals, one hundred twenty in number, govern the Admonition Chamber, overseeing the capture of ghosts who falsely claim to be the August Heavenly Thearch and extort food.

The Heavenly Vow White Marshal General’s Soldiers, one hundred thousand in number, oversee the capture of ghosts who falsely claim to be the Three Officials of Heaven, Earth, and Water, and the myriad rebellious killing ghosts that interrogate people without success and extort food from them.

The Celestial Eradication of Evil Great Qi Troops, one hundred in number, oversee the capture of the world’s myriad ghosts—two thousand paths and one thousand ghosts.

The Hundred Spirits Lord’s Officers and Generals, one hundred twenty in number, govern the Celestial Peace Chamber, overseeing the capture of the world’s five-colored insect-toxin ghosts.

The Supreme Nine Heavens Venerable Elder’s Central Strong Troops, one hundred in number, oversee the capture of ghosts who falsely claim to be the twelve hundred path ghosts.

The Heavenly Crooked Great Five Ding Lords’ Troops, one million in number, oversee the capture of talismanic ruins, the many resentful ghosts that occupy sacrificial seats and partake in blood offerings, and the rebellious ghosts that are interrogated and held accountable without escape.

The Mysterious Elder Great Generals, twelve in number, with one hundred twenty officers and generals, oversee the capture of the Three Officials’ rebellious qi that falsely claim divinity.

The Supreme Non-Earth Lords, five in number, with one hundred twenty officers and generals, oversee the capture of the world’s myriad aged spirits and radiant divine soldiers who falsely claim official titles, and further, summon the thousand masters and ten thousand deaf sage ghosts to annihilate and eradicate them.

**Governing Muteness and Speechlessness**
The Hundred-Tongued Lord, one in number, with one hundred twenty officers and generals, governs the treatment of muteness and inability to speak, commanding the qi officials to pacify and heal tongue pain.

The Nine Qi Swarming Tongue Lord, one in number, with one hundred twenty officers and generals, governs the treatment of chronic coughing in men and women.

**Governing the Resolution of Sins**
The Petition Ministry Lord’s Officers and Generals, one hundred twenty in number, govern the Immortal Village Chamber, overseeing the interrogation of the sick regarding their words, and the transformation of the hearts of men and women, young and old, who deceive themselves and commit sins through their hands.

The Plain Vermilion Lords, five in number, with one hundred twenty officers and generals, govern the Vermilion Void Chamber, overseeing the treatment of the hundred diseases afflicting men and women, their suffering caused by rebellion, and their recovery through reflection, repentance, and reform.

The White Plain Lords, five in number, with one hundred twenty officers and generals, govern the Harmonious Yang Chamber, overseeing the treatment of the hundred diseases afflicting women, their suffering alleviated through confession and the Dao, and their recovery through the transformation of heart and abdomen.

The Heavenly Thirsty Ones, twelve thousand in number, are appointed as libationers, with male and female officials and soldiers recording their sins, who then receive these spirits.

The Yang Foremost Lord, one in number, with one hundred twenty officers and generals, governs the Yang Nourishment Chamber, treating the hundred diseases of the world’s men and women, their suffering relieved through the heart’s devotion to the Dao.

The Yin Foremost Lord, one in number, with one hundred twenty officers and generals, governs the Yang Nourishment Chamber, overseeing the treatment of the hundred diseases afflicting the world’s women, their suffering relieved through the heart’s devotion to the Dao.

The Heavenly Granary Lord, one in number, with one hundred twenty officers and generals, governs the Celestial Drainage Chamber, overseeing the Celestial Master’s connection to the calendar and the descent of these spirits to heal the people’s ailments they do not wish to endure.

**Governing the Resolution of Curses**
The Qi Narrative Lord’s Officers and Generals, one hundred twenty in number, govern the Plain Chamber, overseeing the sick who have been subjected to punishments, curses, and confinement across the myriad states, and the transfer of their curses to their rightful masters.

The Eight Trigrams Mysterious Heaven Lord’s Officers and Generals, one hundred twenty in number, oversee the capture of the one hundred twenty ghosts of punishment and confinement, those afflicted by curses and illnesses that linger without recovery, and those who, despite their suffering, do not reform. They summon the Chief Magistrate’s officials to descend, capturing the cursing and oath-bound evil and rebellious ghosts within the afflicted, severing their souls and spirits that refuse the Dao, nailing them in place, and striking them dead with six thousand iron rods wielded by the Heavenly Ding and Jia, allowing no escape. Those who suffer from morning curses and punishments, who harbor resentment and jealousy toward others, who hold dual hearts, live apart, and differ in their calculations, are to be healed and their curses eradicated.

The Detailed Breaker of Anomalies Lord, one in number, with one hundred twenty officers and generals, governs the Mountain Chamber, overseeing the resolution of these ghosts for the world’s men and women, healing the sick and restoring them to health. If the people seek to dispel misfortune and harm, they shall be aided.

chunks.original_text: 天田君官将一百二十人，下收捕阴差了脆市二十随轻重。 正一法文经章官品卷之二竟 正一法文经章官品卷之三 主斩草 二部君官将吏，主为辟斥岁杀、月杀、日杀、时杀，葬送斩草。 收葬送冢墓鬼 太阴君官将九地君将某君将等各二人，官将一百二十人，请举工监作一合下，主监临葬送。 葬送君将吏兵一合下，主营护道士所发起居葬送之鬼。 九玄察炁君官将一百二十人，主治西驿室，主收天下葬埋之鬼为精祟者。 太白中阵明皇君官将一百二十人，主收捕禁冢一切之鬼，各令伏匿，葬埋后请复还治也。 左都侯君官将一百二十人治太清元室，主收天下兵冢鬼，绝墓丘，丞墓相冢中二千石为祟病人者。 汉明玄君官将一百二十人，治五俗室，主收室墓鬼。 九甲君官将一百二十人，治九坎室，主收天下民间石开葬埋，上啼哭衰麻合客，令无祸事疾病。 大言君官将一百二十人，治母渠室，主收天下万民葬埋后有疾冢讼之鬼主之。 地畜灵官将一百二十人，治广灵室，主收冢堠墓卿石祆鬼。 太玄君官将一百二十人，治母渠室，恍惚妄走下治之不差，收冢葬送逆顺鬼冢讼之鬼造功吏，一合来下营护发丧处，道路不得阻遏。 九天君官将一百二十人，治地里室，收天下万民葬埋，收劫十二月建墓鬼解土谪。 九地君官将一百二十人，治茂里室，主收天下万民葬埋，收劫十二月建十二月墓鬼，解求适主葬埋已讫，续得疾病，冢中有讼，连祸乡邑者。 大神人君官将一百二十人，治其室，主收移徙缮治作冢日食禁忌之鬼。 章驿君官将一百二十人，治泰请室，主收主墓绝墓神丘丞墓伯冢中千二石为民作精祟者。 九德君官将一百二十人，治越性室，牢帅冢五害不利，不到墓养命之鬼。 赤玄君官将一百二十人，治少阳室，主收天下诸墓耗鬼。 秦关得明君官将一百一十人，治少室，主收天下自称刑谪之鬼。 素车白马君兵士十万人，主收十墓鬼将军比考之。 破逆君官将一百二十人，治汉仙室，主收万民渊墓狂殊之鬼精。 阳方君官将一百二十人，治天门室，主收天下诸墓功太岁大将军太玄真符，摄下女青韶书主之。 冢墓之鬼 演豹君五人官将一百二十人，治五诺室，主收天下墓鬼。 河伯河水使者十二人，从事小邮驿马故行，主收捕冢墓男女之殃祥。 太黄太极君符下女青诏书，地下二千石，泰山二十四狱主收冢墓之鬼。 太素太始君五人，官将一百二十人一合下符摄地，二千石女青诏书丘丞墓伯十二冢鬼。 无上高苍君兵十万，主收先祖五墓之鬼来着子孙者主之。 主土公鬼 制地君五人，官将一百二十人，治宜泉室，主收天下高卑太岁行年本命上土公之鬼。 制地君官将一百二十人，治地里室，主收天下土公之鬼。 九德君官将一百二十人，治水室，主收天下土公之鬼。 安石君官将一百二十人，治玄黄室，主收天下诸山猎精土公之鬼。 主土炁鬼 刚武敢健君吏一合下部将军吏，主收捕天下土炁之鬼。 天匠君官将一百二十人，治垂室，主作营镇，收十二时，役使主四百功禁忌之鬼。 仙官激炁君官将一百二十人，治四川室，主收百功禁忌之鬼，治起土方丈舍束西傍主之。 扬方君官将一百二十人，治天龙门室，主收太岁大将军十二月建土炁。 安玄君官将一百二十人，治丙午室，主收捕天下水土公之鬼。
